My business (www.TheLEDCube.com) doesn't make in a year what you make in a week, and I TAKE PAYPAL....and if someone wants to use a credit card, they can do that through paypal... I don't get it - I honestly thought you'd have better business sense than that. I don't even have to ask people to sign up for anything because it just takes your info for shipping etc right from your paypal payment. I print my shipping labels from there too... I mean seriously - WTF???? I don't have to ask people to type shit in, and I know everything is right, no typos, because they don't have to type anything in, and neither do I. That's just BS man!
